enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding options to the Options instance, with addOptionGroup managing OptionGroups and addOption managing individual Options.
Both methods handle the addition of options, with addOptions adding multiple options at once and addOptionGroup adding a group of options.
Both methods involve managing OptionGroups, with addOptionGroup adding them and getOptionGroup retrieving them.
Both methods deal with OptionGroups, with addOptionGroup adding them and getOptionGroups retrieving all groups.
